name: Element Crush
description:
Element Crush is a mashup of a match-3 game and a tower defense. There is a 6x6 board where one must make towers to prevent enemies from getting through. The match-3 elements make it tricky to maintain towers in the correct places, making each move important. 

Element Crush is being made into a full game!

If you'd like to play with some new features before they're added to the proper game, go to https://vfqd.itch.io/element-crush-experimental I'd love to hear your feedback!

Follow me on twitter - https://twitter.com/vfqd_

And join our discord - https://discord.gg/GpE5K3s

Old highscores - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/19GdaYPmaMtQ9t-HtSmLcWSO7jklYijzqB1ZR2yfP...

How to play:

- Left click to select an element, left click again on an adjacent element to swap

- Right click to deselect an element

- Get 3 of the same element in a row to combine into a tower

- Get 3 of the same tower in a row to combine into a stronger tower

- Hover over a tile to see more information about that tile

- Enemies will spawn at the red arrows

- Choose 3 abilities at the start of the game, you will be able to use the gold you make in the game to buy these abilities

- Survive for as long as possible
